subject: Speed Skating
Ice Skating
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Chad Hedrick set a track record in the 1,500 meters of 1 minute 44.47 seconds, eclipsing the year-old mark set by his rival Shani Davis.
snippet: Chad Hedrick set a track record in the 1,500 meters of 1 minute 44.47 seconds, eclipsing the year-old mark set by his rival Shani Davis.
